summary: Complete UI/UX redesign testing for Ad Astra Consultants website. All 14 features tested successfully. Backend API (13/13 tests passed). Frontend UI elements, navigation, and interactions all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test data created in Supabase tables via API tests (newsletter_subscriptions, contact_submissions, cv_submissions, consultation_requests)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Major UI redesign complete and working. New design system: Fraunces serif headlines, Outfit body, IBM Plex Mono labels. Glass-morphism cards (.glass-card-dark, .glass-card-light), pill-shaped buttons (.btn-primary, .btn-secondary), dark/light alternating sections. Section rhythm: Hero(dark) → ForYou(light) → Stats(dark) → Services(light) → Industries(dark) → Trust(light-cream) → CTA(dark) → Footer(darkest). All data-testid attributes present for testing.

tested_features.homepage_loads: PASS - Homepage loads at / without console errors
tested_features.hero_section: PASS - Dark background with gradient mesh, 'GLOBAL RECRUITMENT' label, Fraunces headline 'Connecting Exceptional Talent With Global Opportunity', two pill buttons (Find Talent, Explore Careers)
tested_features.foryou_section: PASS - Warm white background, '01 — WHAT WE DO' label, 3 glass cards with audience labels (For Employers, For Candidates, For Enterprises Scaling Fast) and CTAs
tested_features.stats_ribbon: PASS - Dark background, 4 animated stat counters (18+, 250+, 50+, 10,000+) with animation from 0 to final value
tested_features.services_section: PASS - '02 — SERVICES' label, 6 numbered glass cards with icons (Executive Search, Contingent Search, RPO, Temporary Staffing, Payroll Management, HR Consulting)
tested_features.industries_section: PASS - Dark background, '03 — INDUSTRIES', scrolling strip of industry names with icons
tested_features.trust_section: PASS - Cream background, '04 — RECOGNITION', media logos (Forbes, Silicon India, Oxford Economics, Cummins), award cards, pull quote testimonial
tested_features.cta_section: PASS - Dark background, 'Ready to Find Exceptional Talent?' with two pill buttons (Schedule Consultation, Submit CV)
tested_features.footer: PASS - Darkest background (#080808), newsletter subscription form, 5-column grid (Company, Services, Global Offices, Get in Touch), social icons (LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram)
tested_features.navbar: PASS - Fixed, glass blur on scroll (backdrop-blur-24px), white logo, 'Get in Touch' pill CTA button, hamburger animation on mobile (X transformation)
tested_features.about_page: PASS - About page at /about renders with new design system (dark hero, sections numbered 01-05)
tested_features.navigation: PASS - Navigation between / and /about works correctly via react-router Links
tested_features.contact_modal: PASS - Contact modal opens from 'Get in Touch' button with Full Name, Email, Company, Phone, Inquiry Type dropdown, Message textarea, Send Message button
tested_features.newsletter_form: PASS - Newsletter form submission works (enter email, click Subscribe, API call succeeds)

TestHealthCheck.test_status_endpoint_get: PASS - Returns list of status checks

TestStatusAPI.test_create_status_check: PASS - Creates status with id, client_name, timestamp
TestStatusAPI.test_verify_status_persisted: PASS - Created status appears in GET list

TestNewsletterAPI.test_newsletter_valid_email: PASS - Subscription succeeds with unique email

TestContactAPI.test_contact_valid_submission: PASS - Contact form with all fields
TestContactAPI.test_contact_minimal_fields: PASS - Contact with only required fields

TestCVAPI.test_cv_valid_submission: PASS - CV submission with all fields
TestCVAPI.test_cv_minimal_fields: PASS - CV with only required fields

TestConsultationAPI.test_consultation_minimal_fields: PASS - Consultation with only required fields

design_verification.fonts: Fraunces (serif headlines), Outfit (body text), IBM Plex Mono (labels) - All loading correctly from Google Fonts
design_verification.colors: CSS variables working - orange-core (#E8601C), black-rich (#0C0C0C), white-warm (#FAF8F5), text contrast good
design_verification.glass_morphism: glass-card-dark and glass-card-light classes working with backdrop-blur effects
design_verification.buttons: Pill-shaped buttons (border-radius: 100px) working correctly for .btn-primary and .btn-secondary
design_verification.animations: Scroll animations (fade-in), stat counter animations, gradient mesh animation, industries scroll strip all working
design_verification.section_rhythm: Dark/light alternating sections correct: Hero(dark) → ForYou(light) → Stats(dark) → Services(light) → Industries(dark) → Trust(cream) → CTA(dark) → Footer(darkest)
